00023 Socket::~Socket()
00024 {
00025   if ( is_valid() )
00026     ::close ( m_sock );

00029 bool Socket::create()
00030 {
00031   m_sock = socket ( AF_INET,
00032                     SOCK_STREAM,
00033                     0 );
00034 
00035   if ( ! is_valid() )
00036     return false;
00037 
00038 
00039   // TIME_WAIT - argh
00040   int on = 1;
00041   if ( setsockopt( m_sock, SOL_SOCKET, SO_REUSEADDR, ( const char* ) &on, sizeof ( on ) ) == -1 )
00042     return false;
00043 
00044 
00045   return true;
00046 
00047 }

00051 bool Socket::bind ( const int port )
00052 {
00053 
00054   if ( ! is_valid() )
00055     {
00056       return false;
00057     }
00058 
00059 
00060 
00061   m_addr.sin_family = AF_INET;
00062   m_addr.sin_addr.s_addr = INADDR_ANY;
00063   m_addr.sin_port = htons ( port );
00064 
00065   int bind_return = ::bind ( m_sock,
00066                              ( struct sockaddr * ) &m_addr,
00067                              sizeof ( m_addr ) );
00068 
00069 
00070   if ( bind_return == -1 )
00071     {
00072       return false;
00073     }
00074 
00075   return true;
00076 }

00080 {
00081   if ( ! is_valid() )
00082     {
00083       return false;

00085 
00086   int listen_return = ::listen ( m_sock, MAXCONNECTIONS );
00087 
00088 
00089   if ( listen_return == -1 )
00090     {
00091       return false;
00092     }
00093 
00094   return true;

00098 bool Socket::accept ( Socket& new_socket ) const
00099 {
00100   int addr_length = sizeof ( m_addr );
00101   new_socket.m_sock = ::accept ( m_sock, ( sockaddr * ) &m_addr, ( socklen_t * ) &addr_length );
00102 
00103   if ( new_socket.m_sock <= 0 )
00104     return false;
00105   else
00106     return true;
00107 }

00116 bool Socket::send ( const char* data, size_t size) const
00117 {
00118   int status = ::send ( m_sock, data,size, 0);//MSG_NOSIGNAL );
00119   if ( status == -1 )
00120     {
00121       std::cout<<"Failed send. Error number "<<errno<<std::endl;
00122       perror("Detected socket error on send");
00123       return false;
00124     }
00125   else
00126     {
00127       return true;
00128     }
00129 }

00132 int Socket::recv ( std::string& s ) const
00133 {
00134   char data [ MAXRECV + 1 ];
00135   s = "";
00136   int length = recv(data);
00137   s = data;
00138   return length;
00139 }
00140 
00141 int Socket::recv ( char* data ) const
00142 {
00143   char buf [ MAXRECV + 1 ];
00144 
00145   memset ( buf, 0, MAXRECV + 1 );
00146 
00147   int length = ::recv ( m_sock, buf, MAXRECV, 0 );
00148 
00149   if ( length == -1 )
00150     {
00151         // Don't advertise if caused by non-blocking calls not receiving data
00152         if (errno != EAGAIN) {
00153             std::cout<<"length == -1   errno == " 
00154                      << errno 
00155                      << "  in Socket::recv\n";
00156       
00157             perror("!! Server socket error");
00158         }
00159       return 0;
00160     }
00161   else
00162     {
00163       memcpy(data,buf,length);     
00164       return length;
00165     }
00166 }

00170 bool Socket::connect ( const std::string host, const int port )
00171 {
00172   if ( ! is_valid() ) return false;
00173 
00174   m_addr.sin_family = AF_INET;
00175   m_addr.sin_port = htons ( port );
00176 
00177   int status = inet_aton (host.c_str(), &m_addr.sin_addr );
00178 
00179   if ( errno == EAFNOSUPPORT ) return false;
00180 
00181   status = ::connect ( m_sock, ( sockaddr * ) &m_addr, sizeof ( m_addr ) );
00182 
00183   if ( status == 0 )
00184     return true;
00185   else
00186     return false;
00187 }

00189 void Socket::set_non_blocking ( const bool b )
00190 {
00191 
00192   int opts;
00193 
00194   opts = fcntl ( m_sock,
00195                  F_GETFL );
00196 
00197   if ( opts < 0 )
00198     {
00199       return;
00200     }
00201 
00202   int nopts;
00203   if ( b ) nopts = ( opts | O_NONBLOCK );
00204   else {
00205       nopts = ( opts & ~O_NONBLOCK );  
00206       assert(nopts | O_NONBLOCK == opts);
00207   }
00208   
00209 
00210   fcntl ( m_sock,
00211           F_SETFL,nopts);
00212 
00213 }

00215 void Socket::set_tcp_no_delay (){
00216   int one = 1;
00217   struct protoent *p;
00218   p = getprotobyname("tcp");
00219   if (p && setsockopt(m_sock, p->p_proto, TCP_NODELAY, &one, sizeof(one)) < 0)
00220     perror("setsockopt: nodelay");
00221 }
